text: "You" is a song by Swedish electronic music duo Galantis. It was released on 1 April 2014 as the second single from their debut EP Galantis (2014). It was originally written for Britney Spears, entitled "I'll Remember You" for her eighth studio album Britney Jean but, for unknown reasons, was cut from the album and used by Galantis. The song has the uncredited voice on the verses from the swedish singer, Vincent Pontare, as well as the voice on the chorus from the american singer Britney Spears, both modified with voice effects. en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pharmacy_(album) Pharmacy ==Music video== A music video to accompany the release of "You" was first released onto YouTube on 9 April 2014 at a total length of four minutes and twenty-six seconds.Galantis - You (Official Video) on YouTube ==Track listings== ==Charts== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- !
